amendment.description: To provide an additional $2,000,000 for hiring staff for tribal detention facilities by reducing the amounts made available through the Working Capital Fund of the Department of the Interior.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3676 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3676 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5503) To provide an additional $2,000,000 for hiring staff for tribal detention facilities by reducing the amounts made available through the Working Capital Fund of the Department of the Interior.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3676 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3676 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
